column3: specifies the HDFS path used by Kylin service. The default value is /kylin. Make sure that the user who starts the Kylin instance has permission to read and write to this directory.
specifies the purpose of the Kylin deployment. Optional values include DEV, QA and PROD. The default value is DEV. Some developer functions will be enabled in DEV mode.
specifies the ZooKeeper path used by the Kylin service. The default value is /kylin
specifies the ZooKeeper connection string. If it is empty, use HBase’s ZooKeeper
specifies the Hadoop configuration file directory. If not specified, get HADOOP_CONF_DIR in the environment.

Optional values include all, job and query, among them all is the default one. job mode means the instance schedules Cube job only; query mode means the instance serves SQL queries only; all mode means the instance handles both of them.
specifies the cluster name
to enable the distributed job scheduler.
to enable distributed job lock
to enable job scheduler safemode. In safemode, Newly submitted job will not be executed
provide list of projects as exceptional case in safemode.
specifies the HDFS file system of the HBase cluster
specifies HDFS configuration file pointing to the HBase cluster
specifies the time zone used by Kylin’s REST service. The default value is GMT+8.
whether cross-domain access is supported. The default value is TRUE
whether to support administrator user export information. The default value is TRUE
whether to support other users to export information. The default value is TRUE
whether to enable Dashboard. The default value is FALSE
specifies the metadata path
specifies the maximum length when the dimension is used as Rowkeys with fix_length encoding. The default value is 256.
specifies the number of Metadata sync retries. The default value is 3.
The default value is DefaultSyncErrorHandler
whether clear metadata cache, default value is FALSE
specifies the total timeout between the RPC call initiated by the HBase client. The default value is 10000 (ms).
specifies the timeout for HBase to perform RPC operations. The default value is 5000 (ms).
specifies the number of HBase retries. The default value is 1 (times).
specifies the class used by JDBC. The default value is org.apache.kylin.common.persistence.JDBCResourceStore
specifies JDBC dialect
The default value is TRUE
The default value is 100 (MB)
The default value is 1 (GB)
The default value is 1 (MB)
specifies the Hive command line type. Optional values include cli or beeline. The default value is cli.
specifies the absolute path of the Beeline shell. The default is beeline
when using Beeline as the Client tool for Hive, user need to configure this parameter to provide more information to Beeline
the default value is FALSE, which needs to be set to TRUE when using SparkSQL
when using SparkSQL Beeline as the client tool for Hive, user need to configure this parameter as /path/to/spark-client/bin/beeline
when using SparkSQL Beeline as the Client tool for Hive,user need to configure this parameter to provide more information to SparkSQL
specifies the type of data source used by JDBC
specifies JDBC connection string
specifies JDBC driver class name
specifies JDBC dialect. The default value is default
specifies JDBC connection username
specifies JDBC connection password
specifies Sqoop installation path
specifies how many slices should be split. Sqoop will run a mapper for each slice. The default value is 4.
specifies the field separator. The default value is \
specifies the maximum length of the varchar field. The default value is 256.
specifies the maximum length of the char field. The default value is 255.
specifies the precision of the decimal field. The default value is 19
specifies the scale of the decimal field. The default value is 4.
The signature in Cube desc ensures that the cube is not changed to a corrupt state. The default value is FALSE
specifies the max combination number of aggregation groups. The default value is 32768.
whether to allow Cube contains only Base Cuboid. The default value is FALSE, set to TRUE when using Spark Cubing
specifies the maximum number of columns that can be set to Rowkeys. The default value is 63, and it can not be more than 63.
whether to allow a cube to appear in multiple projects
the default value is 1
hides some measures that may not be needed, the default value is RAW.
normal cube, default value is 0.25
Deprecated, default is 0.05
Cube Size Estimation with count distinct h= metric, default value is 0.5
Cube Size Estimation with TopN metric, default value is 0.5

specifies the algorithm of the Build Cube. Optional values include auto, layer and inmem. The default value is auto, that is, Kylin will dynamically select an algorithm by collecting data ( Layer or inmem), if user knows Kylin, user data and cluster condition well, user can directly set the algorithm.
the default value is 7
the default value is 500
the default value is 1
specifies the data sampling percentage. The default value is 100.
whether to enable auto-merge. The default value is TRUE. When this parameter is set to FALSE, the auto-merge function will be turned off, even if it is enabled in Cube Design.
specifies the max size of the snapshot. The default value is 300(M)
The maximum number of snapshots that can be stored in the cache. The default value is 500.
specifies the size of HBase shard. The default value is 500(M).
specifies local cache path, default value is lookup_cache
specifies local snapshot cache size, default is 200(M)
specifies the default build engine. The default value is 2, which means HBase.
whether to keep the Hive intermediate table after the build job is complete. The default value is FALSE
specifies the name of the Hive database that stores the Hive intermediate table. The default is default. Make sure that the user who started the Kylin instance has permission to operate the database.
specifies the storage format of the Hive intermediate table. The default value is SEQUENCEFILE
specifies the delimiter of the Hive intermediate table. The default value is \u001F
specifies the table name prefix of the Hive intermediate table. The default value is kylin_intermediate_
whether to redistribute the Hive flat table. The default value is TRUE
number of redistributed columns. The default value is 3
the default value is FALSE
the default value is TRUE
specifies the path to the jar package used by the MapReduce job
used to estimate the number of Reducers. The default value is 500(MB).
used to estimate the number of Reducers. The default value is 1.0

specifies the maximum number of Reducers in the MapReduce job. The default is 500.
specifies the number of rows that each Mapper can handle. The default value is 1000000. If user change this value, it will start more Mapper.
specifies the number of threads used to calculate Cube statistics. The default value is 1
whether to build the dictionary in the Reduce phase of the build job Extract Fact Table Distinct Columns. The default value is TRUE
How often the build engine is checked for the status of the Hadoop job. The default value is 10(s)
whether to use local mapreduce application classpath. The default value is TRUE

specifies the Spark operation mode. The default value is yarn
specifies the deployment mode of Spark on YARN. The default value is cluster
specifies the Spark resource queue. The default value is default
specifies the Spark Driver memory The default value is 2G.
specifies the Spark Executor memory. The default value is 4G.
specifies the size of the Spark Executor heap memory. The default value is 1024(MB).
specifies the number of cores available for a single Spark Executor. The default value is 1
specifies the Spark network timeout period, 600
specifies the number of Spark Executors owned by an Application. The default value is 1
whether to record the Spark event. The default value is TRUE
replication number of HDFS, default is 2
whether to compress the output. The default value is TRUE

specifies the minimum number of partitions. The default value is 1
specifies maximum number of partitions, default is 5000
specifies RDD partition data cache level, default value is MEMORY_AND_DISK_SER
whether to request more memory for merging dictionary.The default value is 6G.

whether to enable shuffle service

specifies the initial number of Executors

specifies the threshold of Executor being removed after being idle. The default value is 60(s)
the default value is /tmp/kylin/logs
whether tolerant data source is empty. The default value is TRUE
specifies maximum build concurrency, default is 10
specifies retry times after the job is failed. The default value is 0
specifies retry interval in milliseconds. The default value is 30000
whether to consider the job priority. The default value is FALSE
specifies the time interval for getting jobs from the priority queue. The default value is 20(s)
The time interval for getting the job from the queue. The default value is 30(s)
specifies the threshold for the job to throw an error message. The default value is 0
whether to enable Cube automatically after the build is complete. The default value is TRUE

whether to notify the email when the job succeeds or fails. The default value is FALSE

specifies the prefix of HTable. The default value is KYLIN_
specifies the default namespace of HBase Storage. The default value is default
specifies jar package related to HBase coprocessor
specifies the HBase coprocessor memory. The default value is 3.0(GB).
whether to run the local HBase coprocessor. The default value is FALSE
specifies the timeout period. The default value is 0
specifies the size of a single Region, default is 5.0
specifies the minimum number of regions. The default value is 1
specifies the maximum number of Regions. The default value is 500
specifies the HFile size. The default value is 2.0(GB)
specifies the maximum value of the scan return. The default value is 5242880 (byte), which is 5 (MB).
whether it is compressed. The default value is none, that is, compression is not enabled
specifies the encoding method of Rowkey. The default value is FAST_DIFF
the default value is 1048576
specifies the block size. The default value is 65536 (byte), which is 64 (KB).
specifies the owner of the Kylin platform. The default value is whoami@kylin.apache.org
whether to return the compression result. The default value is TRUE
specifies the maximum number of connection threads. The default value is 2048.
specifies the number of core connection threads. The default value is 2048.
specifies the thread lifetime. The default value is 60.
specifies the cluster replication range. The default value is 0
specifies the number of scan cache lines. The default value is 1024.
specifies the secondary hbase cluster and metadata path. Such as kylin.secondary.storage.url=hostname
The max length of job output. The default value is 10484760.
The max length of spark job output. The default value is 10484760.
specifies the HDFS block size of the streaming Base Cuboid job using. The default value is 16M.
specifies the local path to store segment cache files(including fragment and checkpoint files). The default value is stream_index.
specifies the node of coordinator/receiver. Value should be hostname
specifies the position of metadata store. The default value is zk. This entry is trivial because it has only one option.
specifies the threads number that each query use. The default value is 8.
specifies the maximum number of the aggregated event keep in JVM heap. The default value is 50000. Try to advance it if you have enough heap size.
specifies the number of replica sets that share the whole topic partition. It affects how many partitions will be assigned to different replica sets. The default value is 3.

specifies the strategy to process local segment cache when segment become IMMUTABLE. Optional values include purge and fullBuild. purge means when the segment become IMMUTABLE, it will be deleted. fullBuild means when the segment become IMMUTABLE, it will be uploaded to HDFS. The default value is fullBuild.

whether to build additional Cuboids. The additional Cuboids mean the aggregation of Mandatory Dimensions that chosen in Cube Advanced Setting page. The default value is false. Only build Base Cuboid by default. Try to enable it if you care the QPS and most query pattern can be foresaw.
specifies the length of duration of each segment, value in seconds. The default value is 3600. Please check detail atdeep-dive-real-time-olap.
specifies the wait time that a segment’s status changes from active to IMMUTABLE, value in seconds. The default value is 7200. Please check detail atdeep-dive-real-time-olap.
specifies the maximum duration that segment can keep active, value in seconds. The default value is 43200. Please check detail atdeep-dive-real-time-olap.
specifies the maximum number of checkpoint file for each cube. The default value is 5.
specifies the time interval between setting two checkpoints. The default value is 300.
specifies the maximum number of the IMMUTABLE segment in each Cube of the current streaming receiver, if exceed, consumption of current topic will be paused. The default value is 100.
whether to consume from the latest offset or the earliest offset. The default value is true.

specifies the implementation class which used to assign the topic partition to different replica sets. The class should be the implementation class of org.apache.kylin.stream.coordinator.assign.Assigner. The default value is DefaultAssigner.
specifies the connection timeout of the coordinator client. The default value is 5000.
specifies the connection timeout of the receiver client. The default value is 5000.
specifies the maximum connection threads of the receiver. The default value is 200.
specifies the minimum connection threads of the receiver. The default value is 10.
specifies the number of query threads be used for the current streaming receiver. The default value is 50.
specifies the maximum number of query threads be used for the current streaming receiver. The default value is 200.
specifies the maximum number of fragments that each segment keep. The default value is 50.
specifies the minimum number of fragments that each segment keep. The default value is 15.
specifies the maximum size of each fragment. The default value is 300.
whether to enable fragments auto merge in streaming receiver side. The default value is true.
specifies how to report metrics in streaming receiver side, option value are csv/console/jmx.
specifies which timezone should derived time column like HOUR_START/DAY_START used.
whether to resubmit new building job automatically when finding previous job be discarded by user.
whether to clean segment data in HBase and HDFS. The default value is FALSE.
whether to skip empty segments when querying. The default value is TRUE
specifies the maximum number of rows returned. The default value is 1000000.
whether to check the ACL when querying. The default value is TRUE
whether to check the ACL of the corresponding table when querying. The default value is TRUE
whether to strictly parsed. The default value is LENIENT
whether is case sensitive. The default value is TRUE
optional values include UNCHANGED, TO_UPPER and TO_LOWER. The default value is TO_UPPER, that is, all uppercase
whether to add quotes, Optional values include DOUBLE_QUOTE, BACK_TICK and BRACKET. The default value is DOUBLE_QUOTE
specifies the maximum number of cached PreparedStatements. The default value is 50000
specifies the maximum number of PreparedStatements per key cache. The default value is 50.
whether to enable the dictionary enumerator. The default value is FALSE
whether to enable dynamic columns. The default value is FALSE, set to TRUE to query the number of rows in a column that do not contain NULL
specifies the threshold for the scanned fuzzy key. If the value is exceeded, the fuzzy key will not be scanned. The default value is 200.
split the large fuzzy key set to reduce the number of fuzzy keys per scan. The default value is 1
the default value is 1000000
the query duration exceeding the threshold is saved in the cache. The default value is 2000 (ms).
the row count scanned in the query exceeding the threshold is saved in the cache. The default value is 10240 (rows).
the bytes scanned in the query exceeding the threshold is saved in the cache. The default value is 1048576 (byte).
specifies the query timeout in seconds. The default value is 0, that is, no timeout limit on query. If the value is less than 60, it will set to 60 seconds.
specifies the coefficient of the query timeout seconds. The default value is 0.5.
specifies the maximum bytes scanned by the query. The default value is 0, that is, there is no limit.
specifies the maximum number of bytes for the query scan. The default value is 3221225472 (bytes), which is 3GB.
specifies the maximum number of rows returned by the query. The default value is 5000000.
specifies the depth of stack trace. The default value is 10.
specifies the showing number of bad query history. The default value is 50.

The default value is 90, if the time of running is greater than the value of this property, it will print the log of query firstly, including (duration, project, thread, user, query id). Whether to save the recent query, it depends on another property. Secondly, record the stack log, the depth of log depend on another property, so as to the analysis later
The default value is true, it will save the recent bad query, and cannot override in Cube-level
whether to enable query pushdown
specifies JDBC URL
specifies JDBC driver class name. The default value is org.apache.hive.jdbc.HiveDriver
specifies the Username of the JDBC database. The default value is hive
specifies JDBC password for the database. The default value is
specifies the maximum number of connections to the JDBC connection pool. The default value is 8.
specifies the maximum number of idle connections for the JDBC connection pool. The default value is 8.
the default value is 0
specifies whether to enable update in Query Pushdown. The default value is FALSE
whether to enable the cache of the pushdown query to improve the query efficiency of the same query. The default value is FALSE

this parameter achieves the purpose of shortening the query duration by forcing a LIMIT clause for the select * statement. The default value is -1, and the parameter value is set to a positive integer, such as 1000, the value will be applied to the LIMIT clause, and the query will eventually be converted to select * from fact_table limit 1000
the default value is TRUE, set to FALSE to close the limit-pushdown of storage layer
specifies the maximum number of filters when flatting filter. The default value is 500000
the default value is FALSE, set to TRUE to collect query metrics to JMX
specifies the way of security authentication, optional values include ldap, testing, saml, it should be set to ldap when integrating LDAP for SSO
specifies LDAP server, such as ldap
specifies LDAP username
specifies LDAP password
specifies the scope of users synced to Kylin
specifies the username for the login verification match
specifies the scope of the user group synchronized to Kylin
specifies the type of user synced to Kylin
need to be specifies when a service account is required to access Kylin
need to be specifies when a service account is required to access Kylin
max connection per route of Kylin
if zookeeper is local
specifies LDAP user information cache time, default is 300(s)
specifies maximum number of LDAP users, default is 100
Enable ZooKeeper ACL to prevent unauthorized users from accessing the Znode or reducing the risk of bad operations resulting from this. The default value is FALSE
use username
Use a single ID as the ACL identifier. The default value is world
whether to lazily answer the queries that be sent repeatedly in a short time (hold it until the previous query be returned, and then reuse the result); The default value is false.

whether to use the signature of a query to determine the cache’s validity. The signature is calculated by the cube/hybrid list of the project, their last build time and other information (at the moment when cache is persisted); It’s default value is false, highly recommend to set it to true.

whether to cache the segment level returned data (from HBase storage) into Memcached. This feature is mainly for the cube that built very frequently (e.g, streaming cube, whose last build time always changed a couple minutes, the whole SQL statement level cache is very likely be cleaned; in this case, the by-segment cache can reduce the I/O). This only works when Memcached configured, the default value is false.
